subject: Buffer tool_result when it arrives before tool_call
description: packages/web/src/lib/ws.ts:103-115 + packages/web/src/lib/store.ts:189-205: updateToolResult only updates existing currentToolCalls. If tool_result arrives before tool_call (out-of-order stream) or after clearToolCalls, the result is dropped. Add buffering by toolCallId or merge results when tool_call later arrives.
